main event: Radar detection of a bright, unidentified target moving at high speed over Tube City, Arizona area
interesting points: The object was described as oblong, basketball-shaped, and white and silver in color.
The object was first seen as two separate objects, then appeared as one.
The object was sighted by two pilots searching their route of flight at an altitude of approximately 35,000 feet.

A B-47 aircraft in the area reported seeing two B-47 aircraft flying in very close formation at an altitude of approximately 35,000 feet and heading in the same direction as the unidentified flying objects.
The sighting lasted for approximately 90 minutes.
sighted object: oblong, basketball-shaped, white and silver object
